text.0: lord of all wealth the asura propped the heavens and measured out the broad earths wide expanses.
text.1: he king supreme approached all living creatures all these are varuṇas holy operations.
text.2: so humbly worship varuṇa the mighty revere the wise guard of world immortal.
text.3: may he vouchsafe us triplybarred protection o earth and heaven within your lap preserve us.
text.4: sharpen this song of him who strives his utmost sharpen god varuṇa his strength and insight.
text.5: may we ascend the ship that bears us safely whereby we may pass over all misfortune.
text.6: aśvins with songs the singer stones have made you hasten hitherward.
text.7: nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
text.8: as the sage atri with his hymns o aśvins called you eagerly.
text.9: nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
text.10: so have i called you to our aid even as the wise have called of old.
text.11: nāsatyas to the somadraught let all the others die away.
